recipe.title: Grilled Corn with Citrus Butter
ingredients: 1/2 cup (1 stick) unsalted butter, room temperature
instructions: Combine first 4 ingredients in small bowl; mash to combine. Mix in butter.
Preheat barbecue (medium heat). Spray corn with nonstick spray. Grill until browned in spots, turning often, about 15 minutes. Serve with citrus butter.
